name: Smiley's game
description:
Smile's game

A pilot episode of a thriller/adventure-themed visual novel with pixel art aesthetics. 

You wake up in a strange room surrounded by strangers. How did you get here? But more importantly, how do you get out of here? Can you survive Smiley's game?

---

Thank you for checking this game out! If you played it, you'd make my day by leaving a comment and/ or rating this game. That way I can know if I'm on the right track or not. Thanks again!
